snippet: Dwight Howard is often fouled intentionally late in games, and with good reason: Entering Thursday, he had missed 50 of 96 free-throw attempts.
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard is often fouled intentionally late in games, and with good reason: Entering Thursday, he had missed 50 of 96 free-throw attempts.

headline.main: How to Beat Rockets? Foul Howard and Wait for the Clank
headline.print_headline: How to Beat Rockets? Foul Howard and Wait for the Clank
